DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine early diagnosis risk stratification acquire pre-hospital clinical assessment , 12-lead electrocardiogram point care biomarkers facilitate enhanced triage treatment patient presume non-ST elevation acute coronary syndrome ( NSTEMI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Providing Rapid Out Hospital Acute Cardiovascular Treatment ( PROACT )
DOC.detailed_description: Utilizing platform pre-hospital STEMI research clinical experience develop past decade ; intend investigate best achieve timely diagnosis risk stratification patient present pre-hospital emergency medical service symptoms suspicious acute NSTEMI utilization systematic clinical assessment , pre-hospital 12 lead electrocardiogram point care measurement biomarkers . Additionally , deem appropriate patient enrol clinical Chest Pain Protocol utilize pre-hospital biomarkers . We hypothesize establish pre-hospital diagnosis condition may facilitate efficient triage -as appropriate- in-hospital disposition . Additionally , enhance pre-hospital assessment population facilitate appropriate timely disposition patient find acute cardiovascular disease . These process facilitate decant frequently overcrowd resource Emergency Departments .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Patient activates prehospital Emergency Medical Services ( EMS ) symptom acute chest discomfort acute cardiovascular disease deem probable diagnosis EMS personnel . 2 . Patient old 30 year age 3 . Patient able give inform consent Exclusion Criteria 1 . Patient document ST elevation initial 12 lead ECG 2 . Patient prior diagnosis compatible another disease i.e . severe asthma , etc . 3 . Patient Central Nervous System symptoms syncope 4 . Patient cardiac arrest , ventricular tachycardia atrial fibrillation heart rate > 110 bpm
